p.d: Covid-19 gatecrashes the American presidential campaign In the United States, and notably in New York, Covid-19 is having a devastating effect on both the human and economic fronts. Could the pandemic cost the American president his re-election and play into the hands of the Democrats? If the county goes into recession, could that strengthen China's role. Guest: David Sylvan, Professor in International Relations and Political Science at the Graduate Institute Geneva. Presented by: Dominique Laresche. www.tv5monde.com/objectifmonde
